name: Smith & Keats Music
tag_list: techcrunch-music, production-music, jingles, original-tracks-for-tv-ads, original-music-for-radio-ads, advertising-music, production-tracks, original-compositions-for-film, techcrunch-conference-music, tv-radio-production-music, original-tracks, new-zeala
overview:
Smith + Keats Music is an international award winning production company based in New Zealand. The creative team write original music for: TV | Radio | Cinema | In-Flight | Film Conferences | Apps | Games | Facebook-Games | Social Media Mobile-Games | Websites | NYC Taxi Videos | Ringtones

CLIENTS AOL Tech Media |TechCrunch | 3M | Coca Cola | Pepsi | Levis Nintendo | Sony-Ericsson | Telecom NZ | Nissan | Sprite | Lipton Tea | Guerillapps NYC | Cadbury | Nestle | Sealy | Fiji Tourism | Stolichnaya Vodka | Elizabeth Arden | Kellogg’s Dupont | KFC | Kmart | Boise | Pitney Bowes | Griffin’s |Wrigley

AWARDS 50+ National & International Awards: New Zealand, Hollywood International Broadcasting Awards, Los Angles & The New York Advertising Festivals from 1990 to 2012.

CURRENT PROJECT Hear our latest tracks for the 2012 AOL Tech Media TechCrunch Disrupt Projects for New York, San Francisco & Beijing at:

www.smithandkeats.com Follow us on twitter: @stevekeats
